20110114020354.000|20110114020356.000|CC1|ACQUIRE STOCKS, AND EXPAND

20110114020811.000|20110114020812.000|CC1|>> THANK YOU VERY MUCH.         
20110114020812.000|20110114020814.000|CC1|OUR REPORTER EMILY WANG LIVE    
20110114020814.000|20110114020815.000|CC1|FROM THE TOKYO STOCK EXCHANGE.  
20110114020815.000|20110114020817.000|CC1|NOW BACK TO THE MAIN NEWS WITH  
20110114020817.000|20110114020817.000|CC1|CATHERINE.                      
20110114020817.000|20110114021047.000|SEG|Type=Story
20110114020817.000|20110114020819.000|CC1|>>> THANKS VERY MUCH, INES.

20110114020821.000|20110114020823.000|CC1|HAS FILED A CRIMINAL COMPLAINT  
20110114020823.000|20110114020825.000|CC1|WITH FRENCH PROSECUTORS OVER

20110114020829.000|20110114020829.000|CC1|SUSPECTS.

20110114020838.000|20110114020840.000|CC1|ALL THREE HAVE DENIED THE       
20110114020840.000|20110114020840.000|CC1|CHARGES.

20110114020842.000|20110114020844.000|CC1|FILED THE COMPLAINT AGAINST

20110114020846.000|20110114020847.000|CC1|INDUSTRIAL ESPIONAGE, BREACH OF 
20110114020847.000|20110114020849.000|CC1|TRUST, THEFT, AND OTHER ACTS.

20110114020851.000|20110114020853.000|CC1|THAT IT HAD DISCOVERED SERIOUS  
20110114020853.000|20110114020855.000|CC1|MISCONDUCT, DETRIMENTAL TO ITS

20110114020857.000|20110114020858.000|CC1|INTELLECTUAL ASSETS.            
20110114020858.000|20110114020900.000|CC1|IT GAVE NO FURTHER DETAILS.

20110114020910.000|20110114020912.000|CC1|THE UNITED STATES HAVE AGREED TO

20110114021310.000|20110114021314.000|CC1|>>> BACTERIA USED TO MAKE A

20110114021323.000|20110114021328.000|CC1|COPE WITH WATER POLLUTION.      
20110114021328.000|20110114021330.000|CC1|>> THE WATER IN THIS TANK HAS   
20110114021330.000|20110114021334.000|CC1|NOT BEEN CHANGED FOR NINE YEARS.
20110114021334.000|20110114021336.000|CC1|TYPICALLY, WATER BECOMES DIRTY  
20110114021336.000|20110114021338.000|CC1|WITHIN A FEW MONTHS, DUE TO     
20110114021338.000|20110114021340.000|CC1|WASTE FROM FISH AND LEFT OVER   
20110114021340.000|20110114021340.000|CC1|FOOD.                           
20110114021340.000|20110114021343.000|CC1|BUT THIS WATER LOOKS CRYSTAL    
20110114021343.000|20110114021343.000|CC1|CLEAR.                          
20110114021343.000|20110114021346.000|CC1|THE SECRET LIES IN THESE BLOCKS.
20110114021346.000|20110114021348.000|CC1|ALL YOU HAVE TO DO IS TO CHANGE 
20110114021348.000|20110114021353.000|CC1|THEM EVERY TWO YEARS.           
20110114021353.000|20110114021355.000|CC1|THEY'RE AN INVENTION OF THIS    
20110114021355.000|20110114021358.000|CC1|WOMAN, WHO IS NOW PRESIDENT OF A
20110114021358.000|20110114021402.000|CC1|VENTURE BUSINESS IN WESTERN     
20110114021402.000|20110114021402.000|CC1|JAPAN.                          
20110114021402.000|20110114021405.000|CC1|SHE FOUNDED THE FIRM TEN YEARS  
20110114021405.000|20110114021405.000|CC1|AGO.                            
20110114021405.000|20110114021407.000|CC1|IT NOW EMPLOYS 30 PEOPLE AND    
20110114021407.000|20110114021411.000|CC1|EARNS ABOUT $2.5 MILLION A YEAR 
20110114021411.000|20110114021415.000|CC1|IN SALES.                       
20110114021415.000|20110114021418.000|CC1|SHE USED TO BE A HOMEMAKER.     
20110114021418.000|20110114021420.000|CC1|WHEN SHE REALIZED THAT RIVERS IN
20110114021420.000|20110114021421.000|CC1|HER NEIGHBORHOOD HAD BECOME TOO 
20110114021421.000|20110114021423.000|CC1|POLLUTED FOR CHILDREN TO PLAY   
20110114021423.000|20110114021427.000|CC1|IN, SHE DECIDED TO DO SOMETHING 
20110114021427.000|20110114021429.000|CC1|ABOUT IT.                       
20110114021429.000|20110114021430.000|CC1|>> Translator: CHILDREN GROW    
20110114021430.000|20110114021431.000|CC1|WITH NATURE.                    
20110114021431.000|20110114021433.000|CC1|THEY LEARN A LOT OF THINGS LIKE 
20110114021433.000|20110114021435.000|CC1|HOW TO LIVE BALANCED LIVES      
20110114021435.000|20110114021436.000|CC1|THROUGH PLAYING OUTDOORS.       
20110114021436.000|20110114021441.000|CC1|IN THIS WAY CHILDREN CAN DEVELOP
20110114021441.000|20110114021443.000|CC1|WELL-ROUNDED PERSONALITIES.     
20110114021443.000|20110114021446.000|CC1|>> SHE SET HER SITES ON         
20110114021446.000|20110114021448.000|CC1|FERMENTED SOYBEANS.             
20110114021448.000|20110114021451.000|CC1|SHE LEARNED THAT THE BACTERIA   
20110114021451.000|20110114021454.000|CC1|PURIFIES WATER BY ABSORBING AND 
20110114021454.000|20110114021457.000|CC1|DISSOLVING WATER-POLLUTING      
20110114021457.000|20110114021458.000|CC1|ORGANIC SUBSTANCES AS WELL AS   
20110114021458.000|20110114021500.000|CC1|AMMONIA, WHICH EMITS ODORS.     
20110114021500.000|20110114021503.000|CC1|BUT THE KINDS OF BACTERIA       
20110114021503.000|20110114021504.000|CC1|IDENTIFIED AT THE TIME WERE     
20110114021504.000|20110114021506.000|CC1|UNABLE TO KEEP THEIR PURIFYING  
20110114021506.000|20110114021509.000|CC1|ABILITY IN WATER.               
20110114021509.000|20110114021511.000|CC1|THAT'S WHEN HER HUNT FOR A NEW  
20110114021511.000|20110114021513.000|CC1|TYPE OF BACTERIA BEGAN.         
20110114021513.000|20110114021516.000|CC1|SHE STARTED BY COLLECTING       
20110114021516.000|20110114021517.000|CC1|SAMPLES OF LEAF SOIL FROM       
20110114021517.000|20110114021519.000|CC1|MOUNTAINS AND RIVERS WHERE      
20110114021519.000|20110114021520.000|CC1|BACTERIA THRIVE.                
20110114021520.000|20110114021521.000|CC1|SHE DID THIS WHILE KEEPING UP   
20110114021521.000|20110114021523.000|CC1|WITH HOUSEHOLD WORK AND LOOKING 
20110114021523.000|20110114021527.000|CC1|AFTER HER CHILDREN.             
20110114021527.000|20110114021529.000|CC1|SHE PUT EACH SAMPLE INTO A TEA  
20110114021529.000|20110114021533.000|CC1|BAG AND PLACED IT IN USED WATER 
20110114021533.000|20110114021534.000|CC1|FROM HER DAILY HOUSEHOLD CHORES 
20110114021534.000|20110114021535.000|CC1|SUCH AS DISH WASHING AND LAUNDRY
20110114021535.000|20110114021538.000|CC1|TO SEE THE EFFECT.              
20110114021538.000|20110114021540.000|CC1|>> MY MOM HAD EXPERIMENTAL TEA  
20110114021540.000|20110114021541.000|CC1|BAGS IN THE KITCHEN, IN THE     
20110114021541.000|20110114021541.000|CC1|BATHROOM.                       
20110114021541.000|20110114021545.000|CC1|SHE HAD THEM EVERYWHERE IN THE  
20110114021545.000|20110114021545.000|CC1|HOUSE.                          
20110114021545.000|20110114021548.000|CC1|IN A WORD, SHE IS STUBBORN.     
20110114021548.000|20110114021550.000|CC1|SHE NEVER GIVES UP ONCE SHE     
20110114021550.000|20110114021554.000|CC1|MAKES UP HER MIND.              
20110114021554.000|20110114021556.000|CC1|>> AFTER SEVEN YEARS OF         
20110114021556.000|20110114021558.000|CC1|SEARCHING, SHE FINALLY FOUND    
20110114021558.000|20110114021559.000|CC1|BACTERIA THAT ARE ABLE TO       
20110114021559.000|20110114021600.000|CC1|MAINTAIN THEIR PURIFICATION     
20110114021600.000|20110114021604.000|CC1|ABILITY IN WATER.               
20110114021604.000|20110114021607.000|CC1|WITH THE HELP OF A MANUFACTURING
20110114021607.000|20110114021608.000|CC1|FIRM, SHE ALSO SUCCEEDED IN     
20110114021608.000|20110114021610.000|CC1|BLENDING IT INTO A MATERIAL THAT
20110114021610.000|20110114021617.000|CC1|MAKES UP THE BLOCKS.            
20110114021617.000|20110114021618.000|CC1|>> Translator: AT FIRST I       
20110114021618.000|20110114021618.000|CC1|COULDN'T BELIEVE MY EYES.       
20110114021618.000|20110114021620.000|CC1|I WAS OVERJOYED THAT I FINALLY  
20110114021620.000|20110114021623.000|CC1|ATTAINED MY GOAL.               
20110114021623.000|20110114021627.000|CC1|IF YOU TRY REALLY HARD, YOU CAN 
20110114021627.000|20110114021629.000|CC1|ACHIEVE ANYTHING.
